page.title: 14Old People's Home:Fairford
page.content: {Beaumoor Place}is a group of flats and bungalows for old people. The warden, Mrs. Francis, has a master key for the flats. There are 27 flats and 38 people living there. There are gardens around the flats.They have an art club once a week, regular coffee mornings and snooker on a Saturday.The flats contain a bedroom, kitchen,living room and a bathroom. There are no services provided. The flats have been open since 1980 and, the people like living there because they feel{secure.}They have between three and four outings a year. Mrs Francis enjoys her job because she feels she is helping these people.
